release_note: dear stoics. this update brings the option to switch back to the old button UI for mood check ins instead of new sliders. it will also add: new iMessage stickers journaling suggestions in reflections. you can add them in morning evening reflection personalization. best m.

dear stoics we need to address a significant topic the much debated slider feature. in our upcoming update we will introduce an option allowing you to switch from the slider to traditional buttons aligning with your preferences. currently you have the ability to disable the mood checkin on the launch by navigating to your profile preferences. despite this change we maintain our stance that the slider offers a superior user experience. best m.

dear stoics. in this update we polished our new redesign a bit further. we ve also given you the preference to skip the mood check in while opening the app if you don t want it. we ve also added some easter eggs to the app and you can let us know in our discord if you find them! best m.

dear stoics in this major update journaling just got a whole lot more personal. introducing Journaling Suggestions based on adventures and favorite moments in your life: captured a photo or video write the story behind each frame. discovered a new place describe the vibe. made a new friend jot down what sparked the connection. got a song on repeat scribble down why you can t get enough of it. counting your steps reflect on where each one led you. powered through a workout express what motivated you. now every moment and every encounter is a muse for your journal. best m. ps: this gem is only available on the latest OS so make sure your phone is up to date!

dear stoics. in this update we ve added some more daily prompts for all of you and have improved the translations and a few other things. we re adding more guided journals for the end of the year so stay tuned for that. we also have a game changing feature in the works and if you want to test it before everyone else be sure to join our discord https: stoic.li discord best m.

dear stoics in this update we ve added some special things for the upcoming holidays. we hope you get to spend quality time with your loved ones and express your gratitude for them as well as reflect on your year so far. apart from that there are the usual bug fixes and improvements to make stoic smoother for you. if you aren t a part of our discord already we d love to have you join stoic.li discord be sure to follow us getstoic on socials for updates. best m.

dear stoics in this update we ve added some special things for the upcoming holidays. we hope you get to spend quality time with your loved ones and express your gratitude for them as well as reflect on your year so far. apart from that there are the usual bug fixes and improvements to make stoic smoother for you. if you aren t a part of our discord already we d love to have you join stoic.li discord be sure to follow us getstoic on socials for updates. best m.

dear stoics in this update we ve added a bunch of new affirmations for you and made some improvements to managing your favorite quotes. in addition to that we ve fixed a few bugs as usual including the one where your widgets might not be showing up properly. be sure to join our discord if you want a sneak peek of some big features we have coming up very soon. best m.

dear stoics spooky season is upon us and to celebrate we ve added a special badge for this year s Halloween! celebrate with a new weekly theme and Tim Ferriss Fear Setting technique to face your fears this Halloween. join our Discord link in app and tell us what costumes you re planning for Halloween. best m.

dear stoics. in this update we ve added some info on how to add our beautiful stoic widgets to your lock and home screens in case you were wondering how to do it. in addition to that we ve also added settings to your badges and streak so you can customize them and we ve also added some new badges! apart from that we ve fixed some bugs as usual and made performance improvements so stoic runs smoothly for you. best m.

dear stoics. in this update we ve added some info on how to add our beautiful stoic widgets to your lock and home screens in case you were wondering how to do it. in addition to that we ve also added settings to your badges and streak so you can customize them and we ve also added some new badges! apart from that we ve fixed some bugs as usual and made performance improvements so stoic runs smoothly for you. best m.
dear stoics. this update adds more daily prompts and a few surprises for you. best m.

dear stoics. in this update we ve added a special guided journal for world mental health day as well as more daily prompts for the coming weeks apart from that we ve fixed a whole bunch of bugs that have been bugging some of you including the Shield journaling from a quote etc. if you haven t joined our community on discord yet we d love to have you in it the link is in the app. best m.

dear stoics. the coming week is mental health awareness week and in this update we ve added a special guided journal for world mental health day as well as more daily prompts for the coming weeks apart from that we ve fixed a whole bunch of bugs that have been bugging some of you including the Shield journaling from a quote etc. if you haven t joined our community on discord yet we d love to have you in it the link is in the app. best m.

dear stoics. in this update we have: added a few new badges fixed the widgets for those of you who did not update to iOS 17 yet why improved the keyboard for those who did update to iOS 17 fixed a bunch of bugs as usual join our discord community if you haven t already the vibes are wholesome. best m.

dear stoics. in this update we fixed the bugs you ve been having with Shield. we ve also added the ability to hide the Open Anyway button if you want to be more strict with your screen time. if you use Mastodon you can now find us on there as well the link is in the settings. feel free to join our community on discord too it s fun there : best m.

dear stoics. it s that time of the year. this update brings: support for the latest os interactive widgets ipad lock screen widgets reimplemented widgets e.g. merged 3 quote widgets into one much cleaner widget gallery new chart in trends: time in daylight new journal collection: introduction to stoicism. mood logged in the widget now correctly appears in journey additionally this update fixes translations that we broke the last time. best w.
dear stoics. this update will make the app open faster and fix a few UI bugs and a crash related to stoic shield. best m.
dear stoics. this build resolves the recent crash issue. we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. best m.
dear stoics. this update adds more daily prompts fixes a few crashes and improves UI in a few places. best m.

dear stoics. this update brings new custom shields that you can personalize and specify when you want to block distracting apps and websites. it also adds new charts from Health Kit data to your monthly yearly views and adds a new guided journal back to school . best m.

dear stoics. this update celebrates friendship day with a new guided journal for that occasion. as always we re also shipping fixes and improvements like the possibility to hide words directly from the word cloud after a long hold not counting meditation as an exercise activity better search new export options better handling of non gregorian calendars and many many more. best m.

dear stoics. in this release we ve added more translations to the app so more people around the world can enjoy stoic. apart from that we ve fixed a whole bunch of pesky little bugs as usual. follow us stoicapp on socials and join our discord if you haven t already it s fun there! best m.

dear stoic. in this update we hope the app doesn t crash as much and we also made some improvements to the accessibility of the app. if you use stoic with the help of accessibility features please let us know what we can do better in our discord you can join by opening stoic going to your profile scrolling down to community. thank you for using stoic. best m.

dear stoic. in this update you might see more animal friends while using stoic we thought it d be nice to give you more company. we ve also added a new chart in trends which will help you visualize your mindful minutes overall from the Health app. apart from that we ve fixed a couple of pesky bugs and made a few improvements that hopefully makes the app experience smoother for you. if you still come across any bugs you can report it to us directly within the app your profile report a bug . feel free to join our discord to chat with the team and community https: stoic.li discord you can also follow us stoicapp on Twitter Instagram to stay updated. best m.

dear stoic. in this update we have two big updates to share with you. 1. introducing stoic shield we can now block distracting apps for you when you want to focus and reduce your screen time. 2. new collections on sleep we now have lessons and guided journals from Huberman Lab and the Sleep Foundation to help you sleep better. apart from those two we ve done the usual where we fix some bugs and unintentionally create new ones which we ll fix in the next update and so on and so forth. we hope you find these updates useful! please feel free to join our discord and chat with the team and community https: stoic.li discord best team stoic.
dear stoics. this update will make your app work more smoothly and everything will load faster. best m.
dear stoics. this update will make your app work more smoothly and everything will load faster. best m.

dear stoics. in this update we fixed some stuff and made the experience simpler. we re also rolling out our community on discord and we d love for you to join. get your invite: stoic. you. community. best team stoic.

dear stoics. remember those days in school where our teachers would give us cute badges whenever we did something good and it felt so nice in this update we re bringing the same feeling to stoic. introducing badges to keep you motivated on your journey and put a smile on your face. we hope it s as fun for you as it was for us to build. best m. ps: we just launched a discord to discuss all things stoic : if you d like to join you can find an invite in stoic you community

dear stoics. we wish you a happy WWDC time. next week our team is going for a retreat to watch sessions from the apple conference and learn how to build the best experience for the next iOS version. the next update will be in 2 weeks. this update: adds new charts in trends and amazing word cloud adds a new customizable widget with a possibility to pick exercise type color we are still working on other widgets and will add more later adds new notification texts for morning and evening reflections. take care m.
dear stoics. this update: fixes an issue with quotes not displaying hides activity chart when there is no data adds journaling and meditation charts to trends best m.

dear stoics. this update: adds 100 new quotes improves breathing chart in trends changes the first two screens of onboarding fixes a crash on the iPad that happened during setting notifications time regarding the tiny detail from the previous version it was the parallax effect. shadow was added one version earlier. to be honest I m surprised that so many people read these update notes and a bit terrified that I can t write anything stupid here . have a nice weekend m.

dear stoics. this update adds: new app icons new charts of breathing exercises details in trends next update will add similar charts based on other exercises new section of based on your day exercises suggestions in the explore page smaller margins in a few views fixes a crash on iOS 14 that happened after completing reflections highlights the current day in the trends view adds one tiny and hard to notice thing to the quotes view. but this tiny and hard to notice makes reading quotes with image background much more enjoyable adds new daily prompts best m. it s so tiny and hard to notice that if you find it and ping me you ll get a free premium for a year.

dear stoics. this update is huge and changes a few things in the app so to make this transition smooth you will see a quick onboarding flow after the next opening of the app even if you use the app for X years . this update changes and adds: you can now specify what metrics you want to track during morning and evening reflections like sleep quality stress experienced during the day productivity etc. adds 326 new journaling prompts not kidding nor exaggerating you will see them during morning evening reflections after selecting daily focus. till now every time you picked eg. work you got the same follow up question. now every day you will get a different prompt related to work. adds new gratitude prompts every day during morning reflection you will get one prompt to exercise your gratitude muscle. you can specify in settings your profile personalize if you don t want to see it or if you also want to see similar prompts during evening reflections. adds new trends view no more waiting for data to load now it appears instantly and all charts got a refreshed design. in the following app updates we will add an option to view previous weeks data and change periods weeks months years so if your favorite chart disappeared please don t despair it will be back soon in a fresh form. improves quote sharing you can now export a quote with a beautiful background image of my dog. also a reminder a few updates ago we added an option to change the background image when you read quotes or affirmations . adds new exercises suggestions after morning evening reflections you will see a new screen with suggestions based on your day focus and how you feel. adds new day focus category partner . adds new affirmation prompts if you open quotes affirmations and click the journaling button next to the star and share buttons you will see a list of prompts that will help you think about how to use a particular quote affirmation in your life. fixes the favorite exercises popup you can now dismiss this view easily. best m. ps. we are currently working on new widgets new trends and a surprise feature.

dear stoics. this update brings: adds new quotes design you can now change the background adds new share you can now share with a nice background image adds new daily journaling prompts fixes a bug with not working reminders button during onboarding flow best m. ps. next update will be huge.

dear stoics. this update brings: new journaling toolbar new guided journaling for mother s day adds women and pop culture quotes categories fixes issues with lagging improves labels on the iPad and macOS sidebar best m.

dear stoics. this update is not fun it only fixes a crash that was happening on iOS 14. in case you didn t see the list of features and fixes from the previous update because it was a BIG one i m adding them here: new sidebar to iPad and macOS apps new affirmations and quotes new high scores section in stats for those who wonder what was the longest journal they did new onboarding if you use stoic for a while but would like to see it you can go to you scroll down and find the onboarding button fixes issues with missing evening reflections fixes bugs of bad looking labels in the journey view fixes bugs in high contrast mode we are currently working on new trends insights view and new daily reflections. best m.

dear stoics this update brings: new mandalas for streaks new improved view for quotes and affirmations reading with autoplay new way of journaling about quotes new daily prompts possibility to add quotes and other exercises to favorites improvements of accessibility improvements of high contrast themes fixes of some barely visible labels in dark themes fixes of watch complications best m.

dear stoics. this update: adds high contrast mode for accessibility adds self care category to daily focus we will work on custom categories soon fixes icons of emotions in journey fixes rotating inhalation breathing pattern best m.

dear stoics. this update: adds dutch localization changes the favorites list to show items in vertical instead of horizontal click button on the bottom tab bar and add your fav exercises there fixes a crash that happened during turning on cloud sync in the mac app. fixes bug with iCloud sync that mentioned something about duplicated records best m.

dear stoics. this update: fixes issues with the app freezing during initial sync my apologies to anyone affected fixes thoughts exercise glitches improves the haptic feedback feeling in the whole app best m.

dear stoics. this update: adds two more unlockable badges for streaks above 100 days adds a meditation breathing progress circle to the apple watch when you turn on meditation on your iPhone did you know that if you have the stoic watch app and do meditation breathing on your phone you ll get a chart of how mindful minutes affect your heart rate the next update will fix issues with the app freezing during initial sync my apologies to anyone affected . best m.

dear stoics. new exercise goal setting. it will help you clarify your life goals. new day summaries with a possibility to export. more affirmations stay safe. m.

dear stoics. this update brings: new apple watch app. you can quickly log your mood and emotions do breathing exercises and read quotes. new share screen. export a beautiful image from quotes and share it with your friends. new notifications during the day with quotes affirmations and reminders about your daily focus. stay home. maciej

dear stoics. this update adds: improvements in the morning and evening routines. now they are dynamically built around your daily focus. eg. if today you focus on work in the morning the app will help you specify the most important actions you need to do and in the evening it will help you reflect on your productivity and accomplishments. emotions picker that will help you think how you felt during the day. reflect button next to quotes that will bring you directly to journaling and help you think about a specific quote. a possibility to export or share your old journals. stay home maciej

dear stoics. this update adds: a new feature mantras. every day instead of your day title you can now pick an affirmation you would like to cultivate during the day. we will remind you during the day to keep it in mind. improved privacy. if you use face touch id or password protection the app will lock immediately after going to background. quick actions. with a long hold on the app icon you can go directly to specific exercise or routine from the home screen. stay home maciej
dear stoics. this update adds a collection of brand new stickers and fixes a few bugs. stay home maciej

dear stoics. this update brings improvements to the main dashboard today and settings you tab . today got a bunch of new illustrations and a new category during the day that will help you reboot in the middle of your day. refreshed you tab and settings. we added more possibilities to customize start and end of your day. you can specify if you want to get an exercise suggestion see quotes and pick philosophies you follow. siri shortcuts screen in settings you will find a new dedicated screen where you can add shortcuts for specific exercises and routines. stay home maciej

dear stoics. in this update you will find: brand new breathing exercise more new icons new categories in questions and fewer bugs. best m.

dear stoics. this update adds: 10 day onboarding for new users. an easy way to walk through all exercises during the first 10 routines. if you d like to check it out you can turn it on in you tab settings use start 10 day onboarding switch. a new layout of visualization exercise. improved layout of breathing exercises. more options in thoughts exercise and emoijs . more options to chose from in focus and what you enjoyed questions. have a great week m.
dear stoics. this update will bring back surprising questions in morning and evening routines. if you want them go to you tab change questions and use the first two switches. best maciej.
dear stoics. this update brings a new onboarding and fixes in iCloud syncing. best maciej
dear stoics. this update brings: a new main view with a list of activities you did on a particular day it will make reflections easier. improvements in routines. best maciej

dear stoics. this update brings a few changes: enables setting the hour when the new day starts. finally. if you always wanted to perform your evening routine after midnight and was frustrated that the date in the app already changed to the next day now you can go to settings and change when you wish the new day to start. adds new charts to help you visualize how much you journal and what topics you often chose. fixes the bug in fear settings that prevented saving some parameters. helps with hiding keyboard in the journal. best maciej

dear stoics. this update brings improvements to trends and all charts in the app. we worked hard on this and will appreciate any feedback and suggestions for future improvements. we also fixed reported bugs and added a possibility to export your responses to questions. for example if you want to give your mood list to your therapist. best m.

dear stoics. previous update introduced a dark mode. this update will improve the stability of history screens privacy and faq. screens with an explanation of how we protect your data. stoic asks questions about personal life and mental health and i feel obligated to explain transparently and jargon free that all data responses journals are safe. have a great week m.

dear stoics. this update brings a proper dark mode. with iOS 13 it will work automatically and you can also specify your preferences in the app settings. we also fixed some pesky bugs like mindful minutes not being logged to health kit and the fulfillment chart not being shown. have a great week m.

dear stoics! this update brings: new journal view with guided topics response to everyone who struggles with an empty page and has no idea how to start your journal. fixes of iCloud syncing and indicating when syncing is in progress. fixing crashes of meditation. fixing thoughts exercise bugs. have a great week maciej
Dear Stoics! This update adds a little improvement to journals. You will be not limited to only one entry a day any more : Best Maciej
Dear Stoics This update will help with two irritating bottlenecks that blocked iCloud syncing for part of you. And add a dark keyboard for night mode screens. Best Maciej
Dear Stoics! This update brings new charts to the trends tab and also to your routines. Have a great week Maciej

Dear Stoics! Kou had a great idea to add one more screen after morning evening routines. It will ask you if the quote and exercises helped you feel better. From that knowledge we will know which content you enjoy and we will get directions on the next features we should develop. In this update we also added more morning charts and we made questions easier to read. Have a great day Maciej
Dear Stoics! This update adds more charts to the morning and evening routines and fixes some ugly bugs you reported. Have a great day Maciej
Dear Stoics. This update will improve your morning and evening routines with charts and more readable fragments of books. Best Maciej
Hi Stoics. If you experienced some issues with the trends screen this update is here for you : And it will also make animations smoother. M.
Hi Stoics. This update will fix: weird colors of texts in various places of the app blinking return buttons saving gratitude message in the visualization exercise. See you next week Maciej

Dear Stoics! This update is a little bit boring since it only tries to fix: a bug while saving responses to questions adds more spacing while responding to questions shows iCloud syncing errors My apologies if you experienced inconvenience related to any of these errors and thank you so much Alexander Jamie Joe and Sarah for pointing all bugs. The previous updates were much cooler so to remind you what happened: Trends Screen charts of your mood productivity and activity. It may help you understand how you are doing and how these indicators change in time. Personalized routines you will see content and questions based on obstacles you are facing and how you feel. iCloud all your entries will have a backup and will sync between multiple devices. Thoughts exercise a simplified stoic interpretation of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy. Customizable icon you can pick your favorite app icon to match the style of your black white colorful device or your laundry See you next week! Maciej

Dear Stoics! This update brings so many changes that it got a special screen inside the app with a deeper explanation. TL DR of the most important additions: Trends Screen with charts of your mood productivity and activity. Many of you asked for some kind of visualization of data you are entering. It may help you understand how you are doing and how these indicators change in time. iCloud all your entries will have a backup and will sync between multiple devices. Thoughts exercise a simplified stoic interpretation of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy. Whenever you will feel strong negative emotions try to put corresponding thoughts into this exercise. You may notice that your feelings were caused by your thoughts and after a small shift in the way of thinking you may experience a significant uplift of your mood. See you next week! Maciej

Dear Stoics. After a month of struggles and fights with the new database this update can finally see the sunlight. It contains mostly under the hood changes and some small improvements but it also lays a foundation for the next update. And the next one will be huge. It will roll a feature that many of you asked and that I promised exactly 27 times in the last week : You can only guess what it is. So changes changes changes: Holly suggested adding a pause button to the meditation exercise. I additionally implemented the possibility to insert notes during breaks. I know it may contradict with meditation teachings to clear mind completely so keep in mind that meditation is about being present and use notes only in special cases f. eg. when a brilliant idea pops in your mind and you are afraid to lose it. Francisco gave me in depth feedback about the reorganization of You and Exercises sections. I m still working on this but you can see first symptoms already here. Andrew suggested a possibility to turn off vibrations. I might have gone too far with the number of vibrations but I find it very weirdly satisfying... You can turn it off from settings if you wish. Irma suggested a new history layout and splitting journaling and questions. for anyone knowing me personally yes this is this Irma my Irma and she really pushed me to change that view. Also huge thanks to Kingman Agata and many many more for pointing various bugs. Hope ya have a wonderful week : Maciej ps. Last week I had a pleasure to talk with some of you via Skype and longer mail conversations about your stories related to Stoicism how you use the app and what you expect from it. This experience was eye opening. I m thrilled and additionally a little bit intimidated knowing how many amazing people use Stoic. Expect many improvements.

Dear Stoics In this quick follow up update after the Fear Setting introduction the Stoic app will help you get a more peaceful meditation session. My apologies to everyone who experienced crashes with Health Kit integration that allows logging mindful minutes to your Health app. Have a great update M.

Dear Stoics This update brings a new exercise Fear Setting. Introduced by Tim Ferriss during his TED Talk helped me personally overcome some difficult decisions in my life. I hope many of you will find a similar experience. Beside that: Clinton suggested adding Apple Health Kit support and logging meditation and breathing as mindful moments. Andrew noticed that there were some errors during export. Irma suggested splitting the history of journaling and questions responses. Since exercises are taking bigger and bigger part of all activities taken in Stoic it was a good moment to redesign the history screen. Huge thanks to Natalia for checking spelling and grammar in many questions and Joe for correcting quotes. Have a great day Maciej Ps. Excuse me if I have not responded to your message yet. I promise to reach back to everyone.

Dear Stoics Nick wrote to me with an idea to incorporate meditation and breathing exercises into the app. Thanks to him you will be able to build a morning routine of reading Stoic quotes meditation and journaling all in one place. Please check exercises screen and also add new Today s widgets. Allen asked to remove misleading X from the journal exercise and proposed better naming of the initial skip button. Ross wished to see the history view with written words counters instead of counting character. Have a great day. M.

Dear Stoics Gregory pointed out that there was a pesky bug when responding to questions some responses copied to other text fields. My apologies for that mistake. After this update you won t need to click save button too all responses will save automatically. Stephanie and Morgan asked if there is a way to fill gaps if you miss a day or two. Now there is on the main screen you will find a calendar button that enables changing current date. Cris asked if he could somehow add a title to each day. It would make browsing through history easier. As a way of filling this request you will find a text field under the main date. Whatever you type there will appear in the history next to the date. Additionally this update brings 40 new questions and quotes Apple Watch Application and iMessage Stickers. Hope it will satisfy your curiosity till next update. Have a great day. M.

Dear Stoics In this update you will find a new section created specifically for Stoic exercises. Additionally on the main screen there is a field to name a day with a short sentence. Hope it will help you navigate the history page better. Keep smiling. M.

Dear Stoics In this update you will find four requests from four different users: 1. Redesigned iPad views. 2. New icon. 3. Pin protection. 4. Possibility to hide days with an empty journal in the history view. Thank you very much for all the feedback. Keep smiling. M.
This update focuses on fixes of bugs found by vigilant users. Next update will bring more privacy settings new questions and more quotes. Keep smiling.

This update introduces a new Stoic Premium plan with more questions a new way of filtering history and a possibility to export all your entries.

1. Night mode a feature request from one of the users a was added. 2. History bug some of the users experienced an ugly bug causing the history of entries not to show all entries it s fixed now. Thank you for pointing it out in your emails! 3. Onboarding there is a brand new onboarding for new users.
Feature request from one of users an extension with quotes was added.
For all night owls: when you log your Reflection after midnight you will be able to select which day it corresponds to.

Responses to questions are now safely stored in the history section. You can get back to your thoughts whenever you wish. Plus a new addition now you can change your daily questions. If you don t like a particular one you can hide it. Notifications are fixed. If you turn them off... they will really not come again. The number of quotes doubled. And the main screen looks slightly different now hope it will be easier to navigate the app this way.
A small change that many of you asked Welcome Quote won t fade so quickly!
Kudos to everyone who will spot a difference after this update.
Today was a good day because...
You can now write down responses to Seneca s questions.
Quick follow up update after bringing notifications. This version squashed some bugs and is trying to encourage you to start daily journaling.

This freshly baked update brings reminders to your app. If you struggle to remember about daily journaling or morning reflection this update will help a lot. The only thing you need to do is go to Reminders section all way to left and set when you would like to be reminded.
This version brings even more Stoic wisdom to your daily routine.
